Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 組織 ASP.NET 行動控制項的樣式特性。

span.span: Organizes style characteristics of an ASP.NET mobile control.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別含有通用於所有行動控制項的樣式特性。The base class contains style characteristics common to all mobile controls. 類別繼承自類別包含其相關聯控制項的特定的其他樣式特性。Classes that inherit from the class contain additional style characteristics specific to their associated control. 支援的行動控制項裝置多樣化，因為所有的樣式屬性諮詢，且可能會或可能不會遵照視目標裝置的功能而定。Due to the diversity of devices supported by mobile controls, all style properties are advisory, and might or might not be honored depending on the capabilities of the target device. ## Examples 下列範例將示範三種使用者定義的樣式，在物件。The following example demonstrates three user-defined styles in a object. A物件會保存三個值對應至三個已定義的樣式。A object holds three values that correspond to the three defined styles. `OnClick`命令事件呼叫`SelectStyle`函式，以變更屬性物件。The `OnClick` command event calls the `SelectStyle` function, which changes the property of the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileStyleSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileStyleSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列控制項的屬性會受到影響：The following control properties are affected: |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||字型的大小。The size of the font.| ||字型是否使用粗體。Whether the font is bold.| ||字型是否使用斜體。Whether the font is italic.| ||前景色彩。The foreground color.| ||背景色彩。The background color.|

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

The specified background color for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於其他屬性，屬性不繼承自其父代。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果您設定青色父控制項上，子控制項的屬性將不會繼承青色的背景色彩，則您必須明確設定子控制項的`BackColor`屬性到青色、 或者您必須設定屬性控制項的父事件並套用至子控制項的樣式表。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's `BackColor` property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 這是與階層式樣式表的行為一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性，以不同色彩顯示文字。You can use the property to display text in different colors. 可用的色彩的字串會是一組固定的色彩和十六進位 RGB 值。The strings that can be used for colors are a set of fixed colors and hexadecimal RGB values. 這些值也可以指定為"#bb7023"。These values can also be specified as "#bb7023". 您也可以使用 Microsoft Windows 色彩常數。You can also use the Microsoft Windows color constants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只會從繼承的樣式類別呼叫。Called only from inherited style classes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，登錄字串屬性支援繼承，其預設值為空字串 ("")。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to register a string property that supports inheritance and whose default value is an empty string (""). 此不完整的範例包含公用的屬性，其實作存取這個屬性的項目所使用的基底類別的預設索引子屬性。This incomplete example includes a public property, whose implementation accesses an element of this property by using the default indexer property of the base class. [!code-csharp[MobileStyleSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/cs/Default2.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[MobileStyleSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileStyleSample/vb/Default2.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性必須是屬性物件。The value of the property must be the property of a object. 您可以使用要使用繼承，或使用共用整個控制項的樣式屬性樣式表的屬性。You can use the property to share styles across controls, either by using inheritance or by using the property of a style sheet. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[樣式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1)和[建立新的樣式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1)。For more information, see [Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba186999-7707-426b-9376-7eed6970e7b1) and [Creating New Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/da7f9825-3cc7-4c0f-9800-7d3cb15041d1).

span.span: An enumerated value that specifies the wrapping mode for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表包含的定義列舉型別。The following table contains the definitions of the enumerations. |列舉Enumeration|值Value|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------|-----------------| ||00|沒有大小是設定為指定的物件。No size is set for the specified object. 這是預設值。This is the default value.| ||11|自動換行至下一行。Wrap to the next line.| ||22|文字不換行至下一行。The text is not wrapped to the next line.|
